description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has used links in e-mail to steal account information including web beacons for target profiling.(Citation: VirusBulletin Kimsuky October 2019)(Citation: Malwarebytes Kimsuky June 2021)(Citation: KISA Operation Muzabi)(Citation: Proofpoint TA427 April 2024)
